game_description: The Fight is VR fighting game, where you can fight as a boxer or a street fighter against various opponents. You can also train at the virtual boxing gym on: -heavy bag -speed bag -dummy bag -focus bag -boxing bar -boxing machine -pads
review_1: Looks like a copy of TOTF but has a lot of potential to be turned into an elite niche boxing game. The training, especially the MIT are excellent but it seems like the developers gave up on the game or didn't have much ambition for it to begin with. If you have no desire to develop it further why not sell it to a company that can build on top of it? It's unfortunate because the potential is there.

review_4: A boxing simulator similar to The Thrill Of The Fight with more and better training exercises, but rough AI boxing. I like the variety of mitt training, especially the pads. The traning ecercises alone are worth the price. However, the boxing is very rough, especially when copmared to TTOTF. The AI is stupid but very durable, and it just keeps charging forward carelessy. Their punches are quick, and since you can only block with your fists, it is impratical to defend, so you'll end up attacking all the time. So unlike TTOTF, this game force you to fight hard but not fight smart. And also this game lacks the function of score board and fight statistics.
